joke: Why did the scarecrow become an expert in intimate positions? Because he was outstanding in his field!
What’s a yoga instructor’s favorite position? The ‘downward doggy’!
Why did the couple break up their routine with a new position? They wanted to add some ‘spice’ to their ‘cuisine’!
Why is the 'cowgirl' position like a rodeo? Because it's all about staying on for the ride!
Why don’t skeletons like intimate positions? They don’t have the guts!
Why did the partner always choose the 'missionary' position? Because it’s the classic ‘go-to’ move, just like pizza on a Friday night!
What’s a favorite position for an acrobat? Anything that lets them show off their ‘flexibility’!
Why was the 'spooning' position always calm? Because it’s all about staying close and relaxing together!
What do you call it when two people try a new position for the first time? A ‘position’ of adventure!
Why do comedians love talking about the '69' position? Because it’s always good for a laugh and a ‘double entendre’!
Why did the gym instructor love the 'cowgirl' position? Because it’s all about getting a good ‘workout’!
What’s a magician’s favorite position? The ‘disappearing act’ – because it always leaves them wanting more!
Why did the 'doggy style' position become a favorite among dogs? They heard it was a ‘pawsitive’ experience!
Why did the romantic couple become experts in different positions? They were all about ‘variety’ in their ‘relationship’!
What did the romantic poet say about the 'spooning' position? It’s a ‘verse’ of affection!
Why don’t aliens have a favorite intercourse position? Because they haven’t figured out ‘Earthly’ preferences yet!
Why was the '69' position always a hit at the party? Because it’s the ultimate way to get everyone ‘in sync’!
Why did the acrobat avoid the 'standing' position? Because they didn’t want to risk a ‘high-flying’ disaster!
What do you call it when two people try a new position and laugh a lot? A ‘position of comedy’!
Why is the 'missionary' position like a classic novel? It’s well-loved and always has a happy ending!
